<style>
    .loader{width:100vw;height:100vh;display:flex;position:fixed;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;z-index:9999;text-align:center;align-items:center;justify-content:center;background:#ffffff;}
	/* #loadingDiv{display: none;} */
	#loadingDiv.show{display: flex;}
    .main{     position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0;  left: 0;  right: 0;  display: inline-flex;  align-items: center;justify-content: center;flex-direction: column;}
	.loader-inner{    position: relative;    display: inline-flex;    flex-direction: column;    padding-bottom: 80px;}    
    .main span{color:#ec1c21;}   
	.loader-inner{      display: flex;  align-items: center;padding-bottom:0;flex-direction:row;transform: scale(0.4);}
	.loader-inner .loader-main{    position: relative;margin-right:40px;}
	.loader-inner .loader-main .above-image{ position:relative; animation: reverse-round 8s infinite linear;}
	.loader-inner .loader-main .below-image{position: absolute;left: 20.4%;  animation: rotate 8s infinite linear;top: 19.3%;}
	@keyframes rotate {	  from {transform: rotate(0deg);} to {transform: rotate(360deg);}}
	@keyframes reverse-round {from {transform: rotate(0deg);}to {transform: rotate(-360deg);}}
</style>

				<div class="et_pb_text_inner"><h2>Put It All Together In One System</h2>
